a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Total number of deaths from road traffic incidents, including vehicle drivers or passengers, motorcyclists, cyclists and
pedestrians. SDG Target 3.6 is to halve the global number of deaths from road incidents by 2020 (from 2010 levels).

text.textPath: SDG Target 3.6 (halving global road deaths by 2020)
SDG Target 3.6 (halving global road deaths by 2020)

text.tspan: Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
